imdb.title: Women of Willmore Wilderness
synopsis: Women of Willmore Wilderness: Canadian Rockies Series 3 x 6Following the lead of historic women who challenged the traditions of the day, blazing trails into a mans world on horseback in the Canadian Rockies, modern generations of women face their own challenges to travel these same trails. Women of Willmore Wilderness shares the stories of riding the Rockies thru time. It shares the stories of women past and present as they reveal how their experiences in mountain culture deeply inspired them. Meet freethinking individuals who blazed trails into a mans rugged world. Share the humour and deep emotion of these souls who find the essence of their lives work on trails rarely travelled.The Alberta Film & Television Rosie Awards nominated Susan Feddema-Leonard, Producer for the Best Documentary (non-fiction over 30 minutes) in 2014. Dave Martineau & Laura Vinson were nominated for Best Original Musical Score (non-fiction over 30 minutes) in 2014. The full documentary is 44:51 minutes.
